<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ranged Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=251)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 269 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

This weapon can be used to [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) with the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) skill at a distance up to the weapon's first range increment. The skill check takes a –2 circumstance penalty. You can add the weapon's item bonus to attack rolls as a bonus to the check. As with using a melee weapon to trip, a ranged trip doesn't deal any damage when used to Trip. This trait usually appears only on a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon.
name: Ranged Trip
